title: Copository - AI Documentation Generator
shortDescription: A fully deployed serverless application that generates documentation from GitHub repositories using googles Gemini API.
fullDescription: Coscribe transforms GitHub repositories into readable documentation using AI. Submit a repo URL and the system fetches, preprocesses, and intelligently analyzes your codebase to generate structured documentation. Capable of handling everything from small utilities to full projects in under two minutes.

title: We.AI - Western Engineering AI Assistant
shortDescription: An AI-powered chatbot for Western Engineering students to get instant answers to their questions.
fullDescription: We.AI is an AI-powered chatbot designed specifically for Western Engineering students. It provides instant answers to common questions about courses, professors, and university resources. The chatbot is built on a comprehensive dataset compiled from the university's official websites and public data sources to deliver accurate and relevant information.

title: Portfolio V1 - My First Developer Portfolio
shortDescription: My first portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
fullDescription: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience as a software engineer. Features a clean, modern design with smooth animations and interactive elements to create an engaging user experience.
